segments.text: The kitchen has an open window letting in light.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A woman is at the sink area with dishes stacked nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's holding a plate and a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water runs from the faucet into the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It spills over the edge onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy stands on a stool near the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinet door is open to a cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching inside with one hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl is beside him, arm extended upward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks a bit uneven.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, there's a tidy garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everyone seems busy with their tasks.
segments.speaker: PAR
